APITestDescription.Description: Purpose: verify, that EventHadler implements only one method in listener. Step-by-step encoding: - Listener interface is created with two method. - Create event for listener. - Create class which has a method without parameter. - Invoke create(listener,class from previous item,name of the method created in previous item) method. - Verify that create(..) method returns instance of listener. - Invoke implemented method of listener thru EventHandler.invoke(..) method. - Verify that method of class created in item#3 is invoked.
